key.name: expert
key.summary: Whether streams should be saved separately and in a lossless format
key.description: Set to "true" to save audio streams separately and in a lossless format for later mixing. Set to "false" to save as a single compressed stream for easy publishing.

key.name: skip-warning
key.summary: Whether to skip warning dialog at startup
key.description: Set to "true" to avoid displaying the warning dialog about recording telephone conversations during startup. Set to "false" to display the dialog during startup.

key.name: codec
key.description: Set to "vorbis" to use the Ogg Vorbis format. Set to "flac" to use the lossless FLAC format.

key.name: audiorate
key.description: Typically set this to either 44100 or 48000 for most post processing usage.
